description: Welcome to Everly Green, a highly sought-after townhome community by StreetSide Development in Willoughby Heights. This bright end unit offers 1,485 sq ft of thoughtfully designed living space with 3 bedrooms + den and 2.5 bathrooms. Corner exposure, oversized windows, and 9-ft ceilings fill the home with natural light. The open-concept main floor features a modern kitchen and a versatile den, perfect for a home office. Enjoy a fenced west-facing front yard with a playground just steps away, plus a balcony and a private rooftop patio ideal for BBQs and entertaining. The east-facing garage overlooks quiet single-family-style homes for added privacy. Steps from Yorkson Creek Middle School, Yorkson Community Park, shopping, Carvolth Bus Exchange, and Highway 1.
